Detailed Description

This class allows access to material data of terrain blocks.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DominantTextureMap2::DominantTextureMap2 (  ) 

This is the DominantTextureMap2 default constructor.

Use this constructor if you want to use the load() interface afterwards.

DominantTextureMap2::DominantTextureMap2 ( TextureLayers &  layers,
float  sizeMultiplier = 0.5f 
)

This is the DominantTextureMap2 default constructor.

This represents terrain without material information.

Parameters:
layers Texture layers to extract texture info.
sizeMultiplier Multiplier to affect the size of the dominant texture map relative to the size of the biggest layer.

Member Function Documentation

bool DominantTextureMap2::load ( DataSectionPtr  dataSection,
std::string *  error = NULL 
) [virtual]

This function loads a dominant texture map saved with DominantTextureMap2::save.

Parameters:
dataSection The DataSection to load from.
error If not null and an error occurs
